app.name: Overwatch 2
app.long_description: Controls: Shoot - Left click Aim - Right click Jump - Spacebar B - Emote M - Map Key Home - Go back to Homebrew Channel. NOTE THAT OVERWATCH 2 NEEDS A COMPUTER RUNNING TIGHT VNC AND OVERWATCH 2 OPENED AND NEEDS A FASTER INTERNET CONNECTION. BTW YOU WILL REQUIRE A KEYBOARD AND MOUSE TO PLAY IT ON WII
